description: Sweden has been criticised for its more relaxed approach to handling the pandemic.
title: Coronavirus: Swedish King Carl XVI Gustaf says coronavirus approach 'has failed'
title_page: Coronavirus: Swedish King Carl XVI Gustaf says coronavirus approach 'has failed' - BBC News
maintext: "The people of Sweden have suffered tremendously in difficult conditions. One thinks of all the family members who have happened to be unable to say goodbye to their deceased family members. I think it is a tough and traumatic experience not to be able to say a warm goodbye."
